analysis.summary: The wiki consists of 12 markdown files organized in three top‑level directories (projects, guide, bun). All filenames already follow the required slug convention. The main issues are a draft document, several files with unknown status, and two overlapping guides in the `guide` folder that should be merged. No exact duplicate content was found.
issues: One draft document (desktop‑introduction.md) needs review before publishing.
Several files have status "unknown" – clarification required.
Two guides (theme‑customization.md, configuration‑guide.md) cover overlapping configuration topics and can be merged.
No redirects are needed because all filenames already match the slug format.

applied.reason: Add project prefix for consistency with other project docs.

skipped.reason: Will be merged with configuration‑guide.md into a single comprehensive guide.
Both files describe site configuration and theming; merging reduces redundancy and improves discoverability.
FAQ is a reference document; moving it to a dedicated `reference` folder clarifies its purpose.
Place FAQ under the new `reference` category.

createdIssues.title: Merge Theme Customization and Configuration Guides
